儘.definition: to the greatest extent; (when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme; to be within the limits of; to give priority to

儘先.definition: in the first instance; as a first priority

儘可能.definition: as far as possible; to the best of one's ability

儘快.definition: as quickly as possible; as soon as possible

儘數.definition: (Tw) in its entirety; all of it; all of them

儘管.definition: despite; although; even though; in spite of; unhesitatingly; do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc); (go ahead and do it) without hesitating

儘量.definition: as much as possible; to the greatest extent
